title: Skin Idea ^.^ CHESHIRE AHRI (harrowing 4 next year?)
body: {{champion:103}} Hi anyone whos reading this im not sure if anyones thought of this yet but what about Cheshire (cat) ahri?(from alice in wonderland) Ahri has few skins and she is played by many summoners. Cheshire cat came to mind because yes she looks kinda like a cat (I know shes a fox)but the characteristics of the Cheshire cat do seem to apple to her . such as Appering outta no where and being hard to catch. I drew a very rough drawing of her and all the white (blanks) other than her skin would ether be a glowy purple or electric blue, gold eyes, and yes those are some kind of leather pants with buckles on them. I spent like 15 -20 mins on the drawing and if needed I can re draw for a better more presise look. Sorry for all the spelling errors. ----Thx >.< sincerely Jade =^._.^= (hope fully the picture shows up)if not I will put a link in the comments
